sql.query: INSERT INTO author_settings (author_id, setting_name, setting_type, setting_value, locale) SELECT aa.author_id, 'affiliation', 'string', aa.affiliation, c.primary_locale FROM authors aa, papers a, sched_confs sc, conferences c WHERE aa.submission_id = a.paper_id AND a.sched_conf_id = sc.sched_conf_id AND sc.conference_id = c.conference_id
INSERT INTO user_settings (user_id, setting_name, setting_type, setting_value, locale) SELECT u.user_id, 'affiliation', 'string', u.affiliation, s.primary_locale FROM users u, site s
